dcterms:description: The LLFF dataset is used for practical view synthesis with prescriptive sampling guidelines, providing a collection of high-quality images for training and evaluation of neural radiance fields.
dcterms:title: LLFF

dcterms:creator: Arno Knapitsch
Jaesik Park
Qian-Yi Zhou
Vladlen Koltun
dcterms:description: The Tanks and Temples dataset benchmarks large-scale scene reconstruction, providing a variety of scenes for evaluating 3D reconstruction algorithms.
dcterms:title: Tanks and Temples

dcterms:creator: Ben Mildenhall
Pratul P. Srinivasan
Matthew Tancik
Jonathan T. Barron
Ravi Ramamoorthi
Ren Ng
dcterms:description: The Noisy LLFF Synthetic dataset is designed to simulate NeRF-style rendering artifacts, providing a set of virtual scenes for training and evaluating restoration methods.
dcterms:title: Noisy LLFF Synthetic

dcterms:creator: Tianfan Xue
Baian Chen
Jiajun Wu
Donglai Wei
William T Freeman
dcterms:description: The Vimeo90K dataset consists of video clips designed for video enhancement tasks, providing a large collection of high-quality video sequences.
dcterms:title: Vimeo90K

dcterms:creator: Ben Mildenhall
Pratul P. Srinivasan
Rodrigo Ortiz-Cayon
Nima Khademi Kalantari
Ravi Ramamoorthi
Ren Ng
Abhishek Kar
dcterms:description: The LLFF-T dataset is a variant of the LLFF dataset, used for training and evaluating neural radiance fields with a focus on practical view synthesis.
dcterms:title: LLFF-T

dcterms:creator: Yuanbo Xiangli
Linning Xu
Xingang Pan
Nanxuan Zhao
Anyi Rao
Christian Theobalt
Bo Dai
Dahua Lin
dcterms:description: BungeeNeRF is a dataset designed for progressive neural radiance field rendering, focusing on extreme multi-scale scene rendering.
dcterms:title: BungeeNeRF
